General.Name: SecUR Credentials Limited
General.Description: SecUR Credentials Limited, a background verification company, provides background screening and due diligence services in India. It offers SecUR Number, a candidate self-verification tool; EduCred platform enables educational institutions to service requests for record verification; and recruitment process outsourcing and temporary staffing services. The company offers its services in the areas of education, employment, criminal, identity, database and media, residential, reference, credit, drug tests, and psychometric test checks. SecUR Credentials Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Mumbai, India.
General.Address: A Wing, Prism Tower, Mumbai, India, 400064
